name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Calendar Plan - Plan your trip on Google Calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover stunning attractions and seamlessly add them to your Google Calendar for effortless trip planning!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Calendar Plan - Simplify Your Trip Planning!

Planning a trip has never been easier with Easy Calendar Plan, your ultimate travel planning assistant! This powerful Chrome extension is designed to streamline your travel arrangements by allowing you to search for activities and hotels directly within the extension and seamlessly integrate your plans into Google Calendar.

Key Features:

Integrated Search Widget: Find the best activities and hotels without leaving your browser. Our search widget provides comprehensive results to help you plan every aspect of your trip.

Drag-and-Drop Functionality: Effortlessly add your chosen destinations and activities to your Google Calendar. Simply drag and drop your selections, and your itinerary is automatically updated.

Affiliate Links for Hotels: Book your hotels through our affiliate links from Expedia.com. Enjoy the convenience of direct bookings while supporting us, as we earn a commission at no extra cost to you.

Personalized Experience: Tailor your travel plans according to your preferences. Easy Calendar Plan helps you organize your itinerary in a way that best suits your needs.

Why Choose Easy Calendar Plan?

User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive design ensures a hassle-free planning experience.

Efficiency: Save time and effort by managing your travel plans in one place.

Whether you're planning a weekend getaway or an extended vacation, Easy Calendar Plan is the perfect tool to help you organize your trip effortlessly. Install now and start planning your next adventure with ease!
